Class ServerProcessor

    • java.lang.Thread

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class ServerProcessor
extends org.shared.event.EventProcessor<ControlEvent,ControlEvent.ControlEventType,SourceType>
implements org.shared.event.EnumStatus<ServerStatus>
    The Dapper server processor.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ServerProcessor.FlowBuildRequest
      A container class for requesting that a Flow be built.

      A wrapper for Flows gotten from the server.
      protected class  ServerProcessor.RequestEvent<S,T>
      A subclass of ControlEvent for retrieving the internal state of the ServerLogic in a thread-safe way.
